title: Having trouble after installing league on linux Mint
body: The first time starting after installation it will show the league emblem with the small load bar underneath, then it crashes. Everytime starting there after it will show a 'invisible' block where the emblem should be and instead of coming up, it will just say error on its icon at the bottom and never boot into the launcher.

replies.body: Although we have no official support for Linux, I'm a huge fan of Mint, so I'll do my best to point you in the right direction. First off, how are you running League? Are you running it on Wine or are you using something like PlayonLinux?
